title: Deadly Ebola-like Marburg virus could ‘spread far and wide’ if not stopped: WHO
content:
1. Deadly Ebola-like Marburg virus could ‘spread far and wide’ if not stopped: WHO  Fox News
  2. Marburg Virus: Guinea Confirms West Africa's First Case  Channels Television
  3. Marburg virus: Man who died in Guinea found to have disease  Yahoo News
  4. West Africa's first-ever case of Marburg virus confirmed in Guinea: Doctor Georges Kizerbo  SABC News
  5. Guinea orders 155 people into quarantine after West Africa's first case of Marburg virus is detected  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 致命的なエボラ出血熱に似たマールブルグ・ウイルスは、阻止しなければ「広範囲に広がる」可能性がある。WHO
如果不加以阻止，类似埃博拉病毒的致命马尔堡病毒可能会 "广泛传播"。世卫组织
如果不加以阻止，類似埃博拉病毒的致命馬爾堡病毒可能會 "廣泛傳播"。世衛組織
